law.catch_line: Privileged relationships not ground for excluding evidence.
law.text: Neither the psychiatrist-patient privilege nor the husband-wife privilege shall be a ground for excluding evidence regarding the abuse, neglect, or exploitation of an adult or the cause thereof in any judicial proceeding resulting from a report pursuant to this chapter.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 25, effective June 20, 2005.
